author: Stephanie Armour
title: Health Agency Official Placed on Leave After ‘#PizzaGate’ Tweet
text:
A Health and Human Services official has been placed on administrative leave following reports that she pushed a false conspiracy about a child sex ring at a pizza restaurant before joining the department.

HHS Deputy Communications Director Ximena Barreto, in a now-archived tweet from 2016, said a Democratic presidential recount effort was a “hoax so we get distracted from #PizzaGate.” The tweet referenced a debunked conspiracy that Democrats were involved in a sex ring with minors based at Comet Ping Pong, a restaurant in...
